hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.jnotepadpp.local.swing

Class FormLocalizationProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.jnotepadpp.local.AbstractLocalizationProvider
      • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.jnotepadpp.local.LocalizationProviderBridge
        • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.jnotepadpp.local.swing.FormLocalizationProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILocalizationProvider

    public class FormLocalizationProvider
extends LocalizationProviderBridge
    Modification of LocalizationProviderBridge for usage with JFrame objects.
    Apart from the delegate provider, constructor expects a frame and instantly registers a listener to the given provider (LocalizationProviderBridge.connect()).
    When the given frame is about to be closed LocalizationProviderBridge.disconnect() method is called. This prevents possible memory leaks.
    Author:
    Dan
